articles.title: COVID-19 vaccine not linked to increased risk of stroke - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Newly compiled data evaluated by researchers in the Department of Neurology and the Smidt Heart Institute at Cedars-Sinai shows that COVID-19 vaccines do not raise stroke risk--but that severe COVID-19 infection does.
